newsitem.title: EGYPT: Egyptian woman gives birth in Cairo airport lounge.
newsitem.headline: Egyptian woman gives birth in Cairo airport lounge.

text.p: Cairo airport turned one of its transit lounges into a delivery room on Friday morning when a passenger unexpectedly went into labour while boarding an EgyptAir plane to the Saudi city of Jeddah.
Fatma Ahmed Yassin, an Egyptian, gave birth to a baby boy in the transit lounge under the supervision of the airport's quarantine officer, airport sources said.
She and the baby later went to hospital for observation.
